extension.name: Content - JExtBOX Content Hits Simulator
extension.author: Galaa
extension.description:
This magic plugin enables for you to increase hit count of articles. Anybody can't know or detect this. Because this process based on statistical simulation.

Author Galaa Publisher JExtBOX - BOX of Joomla Extensions.

field.name: average_weekly_hits
field.label: Weekly Hits
field.description: Number of simulated average weekly hits i.e. number of additional hits. Please visit your visitor statistics before set this parameter. Don't set too high.

field.name: max_number_of_hits_in_one_execution
field.label: Max. Hits in Execution
field.description: Maximum number of hits in one execution. Default value: 1000

field.name: hits_by_day_as_percent
field.label: Hits by Day as percent
field.description: Monday through Sunday. Sum of percentages must equal 100%. Example: 15.93,18.36,17.40,16.55,11.83,8.49,11.44

field.name: depth_of_reading
field.label: Depth of Reading
field.description: Number of articles, opened by one visitor. Default value: 5
